Name: Maniacs
About the game: About this game In this game you are present behind the lighthouse. When you cross the Bridge then your game start. Now you can hear an horror sound and musics. There are many enemy are present in that island so be carefull and there Boss are present in this island and they have powerfull weapon.This game also have Nightvision camera. FEATURE 1-You can control Sound, Sound SFX, Brightness, Levels etc. 2-When you start game there have a small animated intro about this game. 3-Search on island for keys to unlock house and room doors. 4-You can choose you level -Easy -Medium -Hard 5-You can save your gameplay. CONTROLS Also you can find controls on Readme FIle. Keyborad 1 - Characters Control W - Forward S - Backward A - Left D - Right 2 - Others Control O - Options menu I - Inventory menu F - Flashlight N - Nightvision camera E - Pickup item Mouse Left Button - Fire Right Button - Target
